mapper.sql: FREEZE_NO, APP_TRAN_NO, MER_ACC_CODE, CCY_CODE, TRAN_AMT, THAW_AMT, FREEZE_TYPE, INITIAL_FREEZE_TYPE, BIZ_TYPE, STATUS, VOUCHER_NO, TRAN_REMARK, CREATE_TIME, CREATE_BY, MODIFY_TIME, MODIFY_BY
mapper.insert:
select 'FR'||to_char(sysdate,'yyyymmdd')||SEQ_TRN_FREEZE.NEXTVAL from dual
insert into TCOR_TRN_FREEZE (FREEZE_NO, APP_TRAN_NO, MER_ACC_CODE, CCY_CODE, TRAN_AMT, THAW_AMT, FREEZE_TYPE, INITIAL_FREEZE_TYPE, BIZ_TYPE, STATUS, VOUCHER_NO, TRAN_REMARK, CREATE_TIME, CREATE_BY, MODIFY_TIME, MODIFY_BY) values (#{freezeNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{appTranNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{merAccCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ccyCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tranAmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{thawAmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{freezeType,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{initialFreezeType,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{bizType,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{voucherNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tranRemark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{modifyTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{modifyBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update:
update TCOR_TRN_FREEZE
APP_TRAN_NO = #{appTranNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MER_ACC_CODE = #{merAccCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CCY_CODE = #{ccyCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TRAN_AMT = #{tranAmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
THAW_AMT = #{thawAmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
FREEZE_TYPE = #{freezeType,jdbcType=CHAR},
INITIAL_FREEZE_TYPE = #{initialFreezeType,jdbcType=CHAR},
BIZ_TYPE = #{bizType,jdbcType=CHAR},
STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=CHAR},
VOUCHER_NO = #{voucherNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TRAN_REMARK = #{tranRemark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATE_BY = #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MODIFY_TIME = #{modifyTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MODIFY_BY = #{modifyBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where FREEZE_NO = #{freezeNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
